content: raspberry lemonade designed by adrienne fong this pattern is perfect for that lonely ball of yarn you just had to have find another ball of yarn in a contrasting color and you can have a pair of socks the slipped stitch design looks complicated but is actually very easy because you will be using only one color of yarn at time enjoy a lazy day with raspberry lemonade gauge 9 sts & 12 row/inch in stockinette 2 5 mm needles 8 sts/inch in garter mosaic pattern 2 75mm needles notes when more than one number is given the first applies to the small size and the second to the medium and the third to the large the size of the sock can be adjusted by using a smaller or larger needle for a different gauge most mosaic pattens tend to pull the fabric tighter you may want to use a needle one size larger than your regular needle to knit the mosaic pattern for the foot i found the garter mosaic to be stretchier so you may or may not need to change needle size swatching is highly recommended the color changes will be centered at the back of the sock and the sole of the sock to be less noticeable abbreviations sl 1 slip 1 as if to purl unless otherwise stated k2tog/p2tog knit/purl 2 stitches together pm/rm/sm place marker/remove marker/slip marker ssk - slip 1 stitch as if to knit slip another stitch as if to purl insert left needle through the front loops of the two slipped stitches and knit them together size adult small medium large to fit 7 8 9inch ws wrong side ankle wyib - with yarn in back materials 2 - 50 gm balls fingering wt yarn in contrasting colors for sample sock instructions variegated/yarn a & gray/yarn b knitting needles 2 5 mm 2 75mm or to knit cuff using 2 5mm needles and yarn a loosely cast to gauge on 56 64 72 sts join being careful not to twist markers the stitches k2p2 ribbing for 14 rounds do not cut tapestry needle yarn a change to b you will always pick up the new color from underneath knit 1 round finished size for medium blocked and relaxed leg circumference 7-1/2 inches leg using 2 5mm or 2 75mm if you prefer needles leg length 6 inches and yarn b begin garter mosaic pattern work row foot circumference 6-3/4 inches 1-10 of garter mosaic chart until entire leg measures raspberry lemonade © 2006-2017 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry page 1 approximately 6 inches or desired length ending round 1 decrease round knit to last 3 stitches after a row 2 or 6 using yarn b knit 14 16 18 sts before first instep marker k2tog k1 sm knit instep cut yarn a leaving end long enough to weave in on sts sm k1 ssk knit to end of round
